data.name: PuPu's Adventure Park Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the first released demo of PuPu's Adventure Park.

As mention in the description of our game, it's a management simulation game which you have two main tasks!
1. Thrill your guests (The adventurers who are summoned to the park)!
2. Save you clan!

The game is designed to be cute and casual. :)
You are more than welcome to join our discord and share your feedback with us! <3

Have fun!

data.short_description: Build an Adventure Park from the ground up! The PuPu clan had just rented a new "playground" from the Dark Goblins. Manage the park, construct park facilities, and grow your clan to serve the expansion of the Park for "hero" customers summoned from other planets!
